page.title: 20S.W. GUILDFORD: RECREATION
page.content:
There are many opportunities for recreation in the Guildford area including: Guildford Sports Centre, which has for swimming, squash, badminton, martial arts and aerobics. The Lido has an outdoor swimming pool. Stoke Park has tennis courts, putting green, football area, paddling pool, and playground. Shalford Park has a pitch for hockey, soccer, and rugby. There is a rowing club in Guildford which is based at the boat house on Shalford Rd. Canoing takes place on the river. Wey Valley Indoor Bowls Club meets at Stoke Park. This shows that there is a wide variety of recreation facilities for all ages. { By S. Alabaster, S. Avern, J. Bonham {S. Potter and T. Rapley
